# Function: isWhiteSpaceSingleLine()

> **isWhiteSpaceSingleLine**(`ch`): `boolean`

Defined in: node\_modules/ohos-typescript/lib/typescript.d.ts:4619

Does not include line breaks. For that, see isWhiteSpaceLike.

## Parameters

### ch

`number`

## Returns

`boolean`
